news.title: Over 100 illegal colonies in Gurugram civic body's ward delimitation plan but 'no infra yet'
news.para: According to sources, every proposed ward has three to four such colonies, but the authorities have not taken up any development work in these colonies despite the state government’s announcement of regularisation last year.

news.title: Government to fix prices of sand, gravel in every district of Rajasthan soon
news.para: Engineers of the mineral department of Tonk have sent their estimated rates to Jaipur. If the government gives its nod, people of Jaipur will get sand at the rate of Rs 1,050 to Rs 1,100 per tonne.

news.title: Kundan Spaces to develop 1.5 million sq ft of iconic commercial spaces in Koregaon Park Annex (Mundhwa)
EV infrastructure in new building draft rules in West Bengal
news.para: Government officials said the draft amendment will be applicable to all municipal bodies across the state except Kolkata Municipal Corporation, Howrah Municipal Corporation, Chapter 10 of Bidhannagar Municipal Corporation (Salt Lake township) and the municipal bodies in the hills unless they are specifically mentioned.

news.title: Sand mining policy will be unveiled soon in Maharashtra: Revenue minister
news.para: "The policy will control unchecked excavation, which is an environmental hazard. Private bodies extracting sand unchecked will be stopped. The government will set up controls for excavation," said Vikhe Patil.

news.title: Goa: GCZMA to charge fee to certify if property falls in CRZ
news.para: With the number of applications increasing, the GCZMA, at its recent meeting, felt it would be reasonable to levy processing fees for applications for ‘delineation of property’, which is the process of identifying whether it falls within or outside the CRZ jurisdiction as per CRZ notification 2011.

news.title: Pay property tax before March end, avoid 2% penalty: Chennai Corporation to residents
news.para: After the general revision was effected in 2022, more than eight lakh people had paid their property tax, the civic body said in a statement.

news.title: Bhubaneswar civic body to create awareness on building plan approval process
news.para: ​The move came after the corporation noticed that the Bhubaneswar Development Authority (BDA) has been providing plan approval to building, which the BMC is supposed to do.

news.title: L&T Finance invites bids for Rs 880-crore Xrbia loans
news.para: The five accounts comprise Xrbia Developers with a debt of ₹435 crore, Xrbia Chakan Developers with ₹164 crore, Xrbia Warai Developers with ₹156 crore, Xrbia Ambience Realty LLP with ₹107 crore and Eiffel Lifespaces with ₹18 crore debt.

news.title: Jaypee insolvency: Committee formed for implementation of Suraksha group resolution plan
news.para: In a regulatory filing, Jaypee Infratech Ltd (JIL) informed that "...in compliance with the order of the NCLT, an 'Implementation and Monitoring Committee' has been formed in accordance with the approved resolution plan".

news.title: JAL approaches NCLAT against NCLT order on Jaypee Infratech
news.para: The amount was deposited with the Supreme Court registry by Jaiprakash Associates Ltd (JAL), the erstwhile promoter of Jaypee Infratech Ltd (JIL), which is going through insolvency proceedings since August 2017.

news.title: PNB Housing Finance's Rs 2,500 crore rights issue gets Sebi's nod
news.para: ​The housing finance firm, which had filed draft papers with Sebi in December 2022 regarding the rights issue, obtained its 'observations' on March 6, which is necessary for any company to launch the issue, an update the markets regulator showed on Monday.

news.title: China: Country Garden sees 2022 loss amid property market slump
news.para: China's top homebuilder by sales was the latest in a growing list of developers that have warned they would report a loss or drop in profit for 2022 after being hit last year by a debt crisis and COVID-lockdowns that delayed or halted home-building.

news.title: Amazon cracks deal with DLF Downtown, Jayabheri Properties to acquire eight lakh sq ft space
news.para: According to a lease registration document shared by Propstack, Amazon will be paying a rent of Rs 45 to Rs 52 per sq. ft. for the Orange Towers property in Hyderabad, while the Downtown property in Gurugram will attract a rent of Rs 110.5 per sq. ft. for the lease period.

news.title: Embassy REIT commits over Rs 300 crore towards investments in green initiatives
news.para: On March 10, 2023, Embassy REIT commissioned first phase of its 20 MW solar rooftop project, which aims to generate 30 million units of solar power, offsetting around 25,000 tonnes of CO2 emissions.
